title: 3 Bedroom in Northern Liberties with Parking!
description:
Torn between Fishtown and Northern Liberties? Well, welcome to 1101 N Hope Street. Located in The Rye Townhome community, which is perfectly situated 5 minute walking distance from the heart of Northern Liberties AND Fishtown.
Featuring 3 bedrooms, 3 full bathrooms, approx. 2,600 square feet, and PARKING. The only home in the community that is 19-feet wide, allowing for a more functional living area. The home was professionally and lovingly designed. Upon entering the home, you will see the stunning 10 foot ceilings, bamboo flooring throughout, shiplap feature wall, and large 8ft+ windows. The kitchen was updated with designer backsplash, custom pendant lights, quartz countertops, and brand-new cabinets including a wine fridge and pantry with pull-out shelves.
The second level features two nicely sized bedrooms with double-door sliding closets and custom wood closet organizers. The bathrooms on the second-floor feature Kohler fixtures, floating vanities with granite countertops, and contemporary mirrors and light fixtures. The primary suite is where you will fall in love. 10 foot ceilings, FOUR closets, and an updated primary on-suite! An elegant board and batten wall was added in 2022 along with brand new tile in the walk-in shower, vanity with marble countertop, and wood shelving.
The lower level provides ample additional living space! Complete with a home gym, custom built-in entertainment area, home office, laundry, and large storage closet. Convenient peg boards were added for organized storage throughout. The rear patio is private and secure- with a home-built dog porch potty with drain! No feature was spared to allow for a beautiful and functional lifestyle.
Be in the midst of booming Northern Liberties walk to two grocery stores- Acme & Heirloom, coffeeshops, parks, dog parks, Market/Frankford Septa line, and countless restaurants all within a 5 min walk! First, last, and security due up front. Pets welcome on case by case basis. Prefer 18 month lease.
Listing courtesy of Long & Foster Real Estate, Inc.

title: Large 3 bed Room 2 bath Condo Home 2 Garage Parking Next to PATCO
description:
Spacious and Classic – Three- large bedroom (1962 sq. ft), two bath condo home, with additional large roof top office/room and outdoor deck in desirable Haddonfield Commons! Freshly painted. Two garage parking spots. Private storage locker and bike storage area in garage.
Convenient Central Location - Right in the heart of this amazing town of Haddonfield! Just blocks to restaurants, shops, the PATCO train station to Philadelphia, schools and parks. Blue Ribbon School District within walking distance
Great Open Layout - Living room, dining room and kitchen are all open to each other for a great layout and flow. Great Kitchen with granite counters and stainless appliances. Primary suite has a large bedroom with walk-in closet, and brand-new full bath with white and gray marble and tile. Two more spacious bedrooms with huge closets as well. Another full second bath with great amenities. Inhouse laundry with shelving and storage.
Bonus Room and Rooftop Deck: Great fourth room on the third level could be made into a bedroom, a home office, playroom, teenage lounge, exercise room. The rooftop deck is a wonderful feature just off the office. Eat dinner outside, or take your work out into the sun!
One month security. Rent includes water. Renter is responsible for internet, phone and electricity.
Interested please email.

title: Amazing 2 Bed 2 full bath apartment for rent!! (Philadelphia)
description:
Amazing 2 bedroom 2 full bathroom home located on 801 W Girard Ave, Philadelphia. This apartment very close to The Behavioral Wellness Center at Girard .  Enter into the living room with south-facing windows, exposed brick, and hardwood flooring throughout the home. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, a hidden dishwasher, tons of useful counter space, a farmhouse sink, glass door leading to a private backyard. Upstairs you will find a large bedroom with a nice-sized closet with south-facing windows. You will also find a full bath with a tub on the second floor. There is also an open space that can be used as a bedroom, office, or flex space. This leads to a great deck overlooking the private backyard. The basement is fully finished and has great ceiling height. There is a full bathroom and laundry in the basement as well as an unfinished portion that is great for storage!
If you are interest please contract and  give your number Steven  will call you.

title: $1,650 / 2br - 1160ft2 - Bright, Loft Style Space + Backyard, Fishtown
description:
This Bright Common renovation reframed this turn of the century row home into a sustainable gem in this era! Bills are low with efficient utilities and the space is filled with light through all months of the year!
This is a 2 bedroom, 1.5 bathroom row home with original pine floors, a loft style layout and artful details through out. The amenities include: dishwasher, washer, dryer, large backyard with permeable pavers + garden beds, a semi-finished basement that could be used as workspace. There is a gated alley entry from the street that is partially covered for bike storage.
This home is 3 blocks from the EL (blue line) which allows one to be in Center City within 15 minutes, 3 blocks from the Kensington Community Food Coop, Hello Donuts, Martha, Philadelphia Brewing Company, Franny Lous Porch, The Monkey Bar all within a close skip from the front door of this tiny street that also boasts a pocket park!
Tenant pays all utilities, except water.
December 1st, 1 year lease, credit check needed.
Get in touch soon to schedule a time to see the space and make this gem yours before the holidays!

title: 3 Bedroom Available Now!
description:
This is a stunning 3 bedroom / 2.5 bathroom single family home featuring GARAGE PARKING, hardwood floors, recessed lighting, in-unit laundry, central a/c, balcony AND a roof deck, and gorgeous finishes throughout. This desirable home welcomes you into a sizable foyer or mud room with great space for shoe & coat storage. The modern staircase leads you upstairs to the main living space boasting an open floor plan for a bright & airy atmosphere. You’ll have tons of room for a variety of different furniture set ups and the space flows nicely back into the kitchen, separated by counter seating. Your beautiful kitchen features white shaker cabinets above & below, great prep space on the granite countertops, white subway tile backsplash, and a full lineup of sleek stainless steel appliances. There’s a powder room off of the kitchen to ensure that entertaining is a breeze! Continue upstairs to view 2 bedrooms, 1 full bathroom, and your in-unit washer & dryer. The back bedroom features a juliet balcony, and both bedrooms are spacious with wall-to-wall carpeting, abundant sunlight, and good closet space. The full bathroom is equipped with a lighted vanity and a fully tiled shower / tub combo. Head up to the primary suite boasting a fantastic walk-in closet, ceiling fan for year-round comfort, and a luxurious bathroom with dual sink modern vanity and standing shower with lovely glass doors. A balcony off of the primary suite provides the perfect spot to enjoy your morning coffee or unwind after a long day. You’ll have an unfinished basement for additional storage and off-street parking for ultimate convenience. Don’t forget to check out the city skylines from the vast roof deck on your tour today!

title: Center City Philadelphia Apts Near Rittenhouse Sq Be a part of history
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments Near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on theÃ‚Â National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment nearÃ‚Â Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors.Ã‚Â Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & BoxingÃ‚Â . Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media RoomÃ‚Â . Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. This loft boasts over 1,850+ square feet of space in addition to the soaring 20+ feet high ceilings, with a private outdoor patio. Door to door service with the 1-car garage parking spot right outside the back door. Step inside to the open concept living and entertaining area complete with a sunken chef’s style kitchen and full breakfast bar. The large private primary bedroom on the main floor is complete with plenty of closet space. Recently renovated, you’ll love the brand new primary bathroom with glass enclosed waterfall shower and dual vanity sinks. Two flex spaces (the second living area + the sitting room) can be found in the home. One of them could absolutely be converted into a true third bedroom, nursery, or fantastic home office! The second floor loft space works perfectly as a second bedroom or living room/office area; also complete with lots of closet space and an ensuite full bathroom. This loft is complete with a full laundry room, ample closets and storage space throughout. The entrance door alone is surrounded by three deep closets - perfect for all of your storage, coat closet, pantry, and linen closet needs. Located just steps away from Jerry’s Bar, Standard Tap, Dolce Caffe, 3J’s Deli and all that N. 2nd Street has to offer! Only blocks from all of your favorite Northern Liberties & Fishtown hot spots, plus public transportation and access to all of the major highways. Schedule your showing today! **The owner is willing to enclose the second living area or sitting room to make another full bedroom if desired.**

title: Spacious 1 bedroom/1.5 bath end-unit condo in a walk-to
description:
Exceptional, carefree living right in the heart of desirable Ardmore! Originally built by renowned Main Line builder B.J. Drueding Builders, this is a rare opportunity to rent a fabulous, spacious 1 bedroom/1.5 bath end-unit condo in a walk-to everything location. Enter through the marble foyer to gleaming Brazilian Cherry hardwood floors that flow throughout. You'll enjoy effortless entertaining with a gourmet kitchen, designed with Brookhaven cabinets, stainless steel appliances and granite countertops. Adjacent to the kitchen is the dining room, ready for your family and guests. French doors lead to an intimate flagstone patio and garden to enjoy your morning coffee or an evening cocktail. The living room is spacious and airy, highlighted by a slate surround wood-burning fireplace, built-in cabinetry, shelving and bay window. The bright and spacious master suite is complete with walk-in closet, luxurious master bath with limestone vanity and large seamless glass shower. Special upgrades include all new energy efficient windows and sliding glass doors, updated HVAC, two new patios with exterior lighting, overhead cooling fans, new outside landscaping and hardwood floors throughout. For your convenience, you'll also find a laundry area with stackable washer and dryer. This well-situated condo includes two designated parking spaces, one in the enclosed garage, as well as a large storage unit. Enjoy the quiet and convenience of your new home as it is located within walking distance from Lower Merion HS, Suburban Square, Trader Joes and the Ardmore Farmer's Market. The nearby Ardmore train station provides Septa and Amtrak service to Center City, NY or Washington D.C. so that you may indulge in the best of the suburbs and easy access to the city.

title: Great value in Fairmount! A tree-lined block in the heart of Fairmount
description:
Great value in Fairmount!! A tree-lined block in the heart of Fairmount acts as the idyllic foreground to 1707 Wallace St #2R. This updated 2 bed, 1.5 bath bi-level apartment sits on the top two floors of a 4-unit building. The exterior of the building features a classic red brick facade and detailed cornice trim. Inside the unit, you're greeted by a bright and open living room and dining area with soaring 9ft ceilings, tall windows, and beautiful hardwood floors. There's also a huge storage closet and a powder room. The home's kitchen is fitted with tons of cabinetry space, stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher, and the in-unit laundry closet. The home's second level has a spacious bedroom, with great closet space, at the front. A full bathroom and another bedroom, ideal for an office or nursery, complete this level. 1707 Wallace St's central Fairmount location is a walker's paradise, earning a WalkScore of 92. The Philadelphia Museum of Art, Kelly Drive, and The Community College of Philadelphia are all within walking distance. Nearby Fairmount Ave and North Broad Street are lined with local shops, gyms, and restaurants, including Bar Hygge, Rybread cafe, SOUTH, and Osteria. Whole Foods, Target, and Wine & Spirits are also close by. Plus, there's easy access to public transportation, I-76, Drexel University, and The University of Penn. Schedule your in-person or virtual tour today!
1707 Wallace St #2R
